#   Stripe Webhook API
#   
#   Stripe is a payment service provider that enables merchants to accept
#   credit cards, debit cards, and other forms of payment. Its Stripe
#   Payments platform is designed for businesses that conduct most of their
#   sales online, with features specifically geared toward e-commerce
#   transactions.
#   
#   The Stripe Webhook API allows developers to receive real-time payment
#   notifications and integrate them directly into their applications or
#   services.
#   
#   Service URL:
#       https://api.stripe.com
